title: Remake problem
body: Any have remake problems, I mean when there's player afked and suppose to be a remake game but somehow riot just doesn't let you and failed your remake option?

replies.body:
Hey there,

There's many reasons a remake may not become available, check out the remake FAQ for more info.

https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-en/Q88Awl8E-remake-faq
